General.Name: Constr Pasur
General.Description: Forestal Constructora y Comercial del Pacifico Sur SA engages in the purchase, sale, and distribution of material, merchandise, and construction products. It also promotes construction activities; and acquires forest land. The company was formerly known as Inmobiliaria Colon SA and changed its name to Forestal Constructora y Comercial del Pacifico Sur SA in October 1974. The company was incorporated in 1954 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
